name: ohsu!
description:
Yes, this is a ripped-off game from osu, but trust me, peppy, I only made this for fun and learning because my school was having a game jam (I won) and I wanted to make the most complicated game in the whole class because I'm weird. Anyway, ahem...

Thank you so much ibrahim for letting me use your song (my songs are trash so listen to ibrahim's songs: https://open.spotify.com/artist/38osEo6ebgNhOrlD5Xi4iZ)

If you want to help me in the making of this game, DM me on Discord: ThisIsNotSkoopyy#4729

Requirements:

Must know how to use GM 1.4

Do not leak the game's source code

Must speak English fluently (if you're from another country and you speak English fluently but stutter sometimes, it's okay)

Must have a working mic

You don't have to have knowledge about the GameMaker Language, you only need to know how to implement basic ideas to the game and make a prototype for me to review and polish the features and add it to the game.

Way to 200 views on the main page of ohsu!

If we get 50 downloads by the end of this month, I will release a super major update that will change every game mechanic

NOTE 1: You can't use your keyboard at the moment, because my 2 brain cells can't figure out how to make that work. And you can only click the circles with the left mouse button so good luck if you're left-handed. 

NOTE 2: If you're having issues with the .exe file getting flagged as a virus with your antivirus, try using the installer.

Also, I would've added some more quality music in if RoaMusic didn't force me to buy a goddamn license.

macOS and Linux versions coming soon! if you want to use this on Linux, i think Wine will work with this.

(UPDATE: Wine or CrossOver will work, but using Wine will be sometimes flaky but playable. CrossOver Ubuntu works, but also flaky, but it's not noticeable. CrossOver on macOS works but popups won't work.)

I might even make a version for Android.

Credits:

Developer: Skoopyy (youtube.com/SkoopyyYouTube)

Music: Skoopyy (youtube.com/SkoopyyYouTube)

Music: ibrahim (https://open.spotify.com/artist/38osEo6ebgNhOrlD5Xi4iZ)

Testers:

Asymmetrical

gamer supreme

Koverra

Nishikata

Soulgaming1

This game was made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4 with Audacity and Adobe Audition for audio,  Ableton Live 10 Suite for music, GIMP and Paint.net, Photoshop was used for making the UI elements and logo.
